headline: Building consumer wellness startup
summary: Young professional with experience in global energy industry, capital markets, strategy consulting, and financial technology. Main focus on delivering innovative and customer-centric financial services through scalable technology and data-driven insights. Passionate in strategy, operational excellence, data analytics, and valuation.

experiences.title: Co-Founder COO
experiences.description:
Sirka is leading consumer wellness startup in Indonesia delivering lifestyle improvement solutions through Sirka wellness app and Enhans consumer brand. 1 out of 3 Indonesians suffer from obesity, while chronic diseases like diabetes and heart-related illnesses make up top 5 of our mortality rate. Sirka is on a mission to reverse these statistics.

We are looking for fellow passionate and high-performing individuals for various roles to build our venture from the ground up. Drop me a message if you're up for tackling Indonesia's biggest challenges in healthcare!

experiences.title: Head of Strategy and Business Planning
MBA Student
experiences.description:
• INSEAD team for Kellogg - Morgan Stanley Sustainable Investing Challenge

• INSEAD team for Peeptrade Portfolio Management Competition

• VP Industry Outlook of INSEAD Energy Club

experiences.title: Summer Associate
experiences.description:
• Devised 5-year blueprint strategy for Indonesia’s largest telco company’s consumer business unit; analysed IDR 8Tn value uplifts from organization resizing, network design optimization, and salesforce transformation

• Implemented salesforce excellence pilot program at 2 regional branches to realize IDR 300Bn/year incremental revenues

experiences.title: Equity Research Summer Analyst
experiences.description:
Summer Analyst at Equity Research department of leading investment banking in Indonesia. 

• Formulated financial modelling and company valuations for top publicly-listed companies in Indonesia

• Structured and analyse underlying business drivers in devising investment thesis for biggest institutional clients, both foreign and domestic

• Performed analysis on coverage initiation reports for consumer retail and infrastructure sectors in liaison with UBS South East Asia Director

• Performed due diligence with corporate's Head of Investor Relations as basis for company valuation

• Pitched investment thesis to big institutional investors and assisted their strategic investment decisions

experiences.title: Directional Drilling Engineer
experiences.description:
Client-facing team leader for  end-to-end drilling projects on horizontal wells for the biggest clients in UAE. In charge of running Schlumberger's high-tier directional drilling and reservoir-characterization-while-drilling tools in OPEC's second largest oil producers. 

• Led cross-functional teams of 40-50 rig engineers in 5 departments and directly reported to client’s Drilling Supervisor

• Delivered strategic project and broke fastest drilling record in Bab oil field; exceeded KPI by 115% and saved US$250K/day

• Performed innovative problem solving in breaking 25-year record of longest well section in offshore UAE by 30% deeper without failure

experiences.title: Senior Field Engineer
experiences.description:
Lead Engineer for top oil and gas service company's upstream division in Abu Dhabi, UAE. In charge of Schlumberger team in running high-tier reservoir-characterization-while-drilling tools.

• Led the first trilateral well successfully in UAE as Schlumberger D&M UAE's biggest project in 2016

• Introduced advanced resistivity imaging tool, the first Schlumberger worldwide implementation, in UAE; gained global recognition for successful commercial introduction and secured client's buy-in

• Cross-trained to Directional Drilling Engineer for project lead position within 5 months of promotion (youngest seniority among peers)

experiences.title: Junior Field Engineer
experiences.description:
Upstream exploration engineer in charge of running state-of-the-art drilling technology for Norway's and Abu Dhabi's biggest oil and gas clients. Directly reported to clients' Drilling Supervisor. 

• Executed advanced Schlumberger drilling tools in deep-water explorations worth US$1M/day for Norway’s biggest clients

• Led 3 high-efficiency onshore projects for Venezuela’s national oil company as 1 of 3 select engineers to participate in early cross-border exposure

• Devised and replicated lean logistics schemes covering 140 tools for operation in Ghana; reported to Norway's Head of Service Quality

experiences.title: Field Engineer Trainee, Measurement/Logging While Drilling
experiences.description:
First assignment in oil and gas industry's leading market for deep-water exploration projects. 

• Executed drilling operation in high-profile semi-submersible rigs with US$ 1M/day rental rate, yielding 2,000 - 3,000 barrels/day output 

• Completed global training in Abu Dhabi, UAE, for 3 months; fastest promotion among peers within 7 months to Junior Field Engineer

experiences.title: Summer Analyst
experiences.description:
Assigned on a case to improve profitability of leading Asian paper packaging manufacturer. Select project accomplishments:

• Analysed domestic market landscape and competitive ecosystem of paper packing industry

• Designed 5-year downstream expansion roadmap and export-market penetration strategy for 3 Business Units

• Launched sales transformation of 40 salesforce in 2 Business Units; doubled new opportunities generation in 2 months

• Managed taskforce in process optimization and reported directly to Production Head; resulted in US$500K efficiency savings
